tracking_info.description: Any information to associate with current user.
tracking_info.example: any data for tracking current user

client_name.description: Client name to be used in the Bridge.

color_primary.description: Primary color for the widget in HEX format.

product_type.description:
Indicates the type of product to use:

* `employment` - Employment verification,
* `income` - Income and Employment verification,
* `deposit_switch` - Direct deposit switch,
* `pll` - Paycheck linked lending,
* `insurance` - Insurance verification,
* `transactions` - Financial account aggregation,
* `assets` - Assets verification,

allowed_products.description: List of all allowed products for this payroll connection. If not passed, only type from the product_type field will be allowed.

company_mapping_id.description: A mapping ID from a company to payroll provider.

provider_id.description: An ID of a data provider for direct login.

access_token.description: Access token of the existing link (used for the data refresh).

account.description: Bank account info. Used for Direct deposit switching and Paycheck linked lending

action.description:
Action to be performed on the account.

`update` and `delete` actions are only available for the accounts that were previously created.

account_number.description: Account number. Only digits are allowed, leading zeros will be preserved.

routing_number.description: Routing number. Only digits are allowed, leading zeros will be preserved.

account_type.description:
Account type. Required for the `create` action.

* `checking` - Checking account,
* `savings` - Savings account

bank_name.description: Bank name. Required for the `create` action.

deposit_type.description:
Deposit type.
For `pll` product type is required and must be set to `amount`.
For `deposit_switch` product type is optional and can be set to any supported value.

* `entire` - Entire paycheck,
* `percent` - Percentage of the paycheck,
* `amount` - Fixed amount from the paycheck

deposit_value.description:
Deposit value.

Possible values for this field depend on the `deposit_type` field:
`percent` - this field must be set to a whole number between 0 and 100.
`amount` - this field must be set to a number between 0 and 9999.99.
`entire` - this field must be set to `null` or be not provided.

locale.description: Locale parameter for regional customization of the Bridge.

data_sources.description: List of data sources for the provided product_type. Leave blank to apply default values.

tracking_info.description: Any information to associate with current user.
tracking_info.example: any data for tracking current user

client_name.description: Client name to be used in the Bridge.

product_type.description:
Indicates the type of product to use:

* `employment` - Employment verification,
* `income` - Income and Employment verification,
* `deposit_switch` - Direct deposit switch,
* `pll` - Paycheck linked lending,
* `insurance` - Insurance verification,
* `transactions` - Financial account aggregation,
* `assets` - Assets verification,

created_at.description: Date and time when the account was created in Truv

updated_at.description: Date and time when the account was updated last time in Truv

type.description: The parent type of the account, e.g., CHECKING or SAVINGS.

subtype.description: The accounts subtype, e.g., PLAN_401_K, MONEY_MARKET, or HOME_EQUITY.

mask.description: The masked banking account number associated with a particular account.

nickname.description: An alternate name for the account.

start_date.description: Minimum of all dates within the specific income sources in the user's bank account for days requested by the client.

end_date.description: Maximum of all dates within the specific income sources in the users bank account for days requested by the client.

income_description.description: Description for the underlying income transactions.

pay_frequency.description:
Pay frequency:

* `M` - Monthly,
* `SM` - Semi-Monthly,
* `W` - Weekly,
* `BW` - Bi-Weekly,
* `A` - Annually,
* `SA` - Semiannually,
* `C` - Commission

total_amount.description: Total amount of earnings for the income source of the user in the summary.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

transaction_count.description: Number of income transactions per end user for this source.

historical_summary.description: List of bank statements for each period.

start_date.description: The start date of the period covered in this monthly summary. This date will be the first day of the month, unless the month being covered is a partial month because it is the first month included in the summary and the date range being requested does not begin with the first day of the month.

end_date.description: The end date of the period included in this monthly summary. This date will be the last day of the month, unless the month being covered is a partial month because it is the last month included in the summary and the date range being requested does not end with the last day of the month.

total_amount.description: Total amount of earnings for the income source of the user for the month in the summary.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

amount.description: The settled value of the transaction, denominated in the transactions's currency as stated in iso_currency_code. Negative values when money moves out of the account; positive othervise.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

date.description: The date that the transaction occurred.

check_number.description: The check number for the transaction.

pending.description: True if status of the transaction is PENDING or not set.

avg_deposit_amount.description: The average amount received per deposit, typically net of taxes and deductions.

avg_gross_deposit_amount.description: The average gross payment per deposit. Gross pay is predicted based on the transaction data.

start_date.description: Minimum of all transaction dates among all income sources in the user's bank accounts for days requested by the client.

end_date.description: Maximum of all transaction dates among all income sources in the user's bank accounts for days requested by the client.

income_sources_count.description: Number of income sources per end user.

income_categories_count.description: Number of income categories per end user.

income_transactions_count.description: Number of income transactions per end user.

total_amount.description: Total amount of earnings for the income of the user in summary.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

completed_at.description: Timestamp when the report was completed.

days_requested.description: The specific duration in days for which the report is requested to be generated.

tracking_info.description: Additional optional identifier passed by user.

access_token.description: Access token of the existing link.

companies.description: Names of the companies person works for.

is_suspicious.description: Flag to indicate if the data from the source is suspicious. E.g. fraud detected in uploaded documents or SSN of the user does not match with the data

paid_in_full.description: Whether the policy is fully paid

end_date.description: End date of the Shift. ISO 8601 format.

count.description: Number of the results in total

check_number.description: External ID of pay stub from the payroll provider

hours.description: Work hours during a pay period

Basis of pay:

* `H` - Hourly,
* `D` - Daily,
* `W` - Weekly,
* `M` - Monthly,
* `C` - Contract,

other_pay_ytd.description: All other pays year to date

earnings.description: Earnings for this pay cycle by type

earnings_ytd.description: Earnings year to date by type

deductions.description: Deductions for this pay cycle by type

deductions_ytd.description: Deductions year to date by type

md5sum.description: MD5 hash value computed based on the file content

file.description: Link to a pay stub file (format is specified in the content-type)

count.description: Number of the results in total

fields.title: fields
fields.description: Tax document fields. Set of fields depends on the document type and subtype.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created in Truv

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the transaction was updated last time in Truv

memo.description: Additional descriptive information about the transaction

merchant_category_code.description: The ISO 18245 category code for the transaction

account.description: Bank account info. Used for Direct deposit switching and Paycheck linked lending

action.description:
Action to be performed on the account.

`update` and `delete` actions are only available for the accounts that were previously created.

account_number.description: Account number. Only digits are allowed, leading zeros will be preserved.

routing_number.description: Routing number. Only digits are allowed, leading zeros will be preserved.

account_type.description:
Account type. Required for the `create` action.

* `checking` - Checking account,
* `savings` - Savings account

bank_name.description: Bank name. Required for the `create` action.

deposit_type.description:
Deposit type.
For `pll` product type is required and must be set to `amount`.
For `deposit_switch` product type is optional and can be set to any supported value.

* `entire` - Entire paycheck,
* `percent` - Percentage of the paycheck,
* `amount` - Fixed amount from the paycheck

deposit_value.description:
Deposit value.

Possible values for this field depend on the `deposit_type` field:
`percent` - this field must be set to a whole number between 0 and 100.
`amount` - this field must be set to a number between 0 and 9999.99.
`entire` - this field must be set to `null` or be not provided.

data_sources.description: List of data sources for the provided product_type. Leave blank to apply default values.

fixed_amount.description: Amount that must be met or exceeded for deposits to be marked as large, when OTHER loan type is specified.

sales_price.description: Amount that must be met or exceeded for deposits to be marked as large, when FHA loan type is specified.

qualifying_monthly_income.description: Amount that must be met or exceeded for deposits to be marked as large, when CONVENTIONAL loan type is specified.

balance.description: The current balance of the account.

available_balance.description: The balance that is available for use in asset accounts like checking and savings. PENDING transactions are typically taken into account with the available balance, but this may not always be the case.

credit_limit.description: The credit limit associated with the account.

external_id.description: Identifier of the transaction in the external system.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the transaction.

check_number.description: The check number for the transaction.

categories.description: List of categories assigned to this transaction.

status.description: The status of the transaction. This will be either POSTED or PENDING.

type.description: The type of transaction. This will be either CREDIT or DEBIT.

transacted_at.description: Timestamp when the the transaction took place.

merchant_category_code.description: The ISO 18245 category code for the transaction.

is_direct_deposit.description: Indicates if the transaction represents a direct deposit.

is_subscription.description: Indicates if the transaction represents a payment for a subscription.

relation_type.description: The relationship this person has to the account.

updated_at.description: The date and time at which the account was most recently updated.

type.description: The parent type of the account, e.g., CHECKING or SAVINGS.

subtype.description: The accounts subtype, e.g., PLAN_401_K, MONEY_MARKET, or HOME_EQUITY.

mask.description: The masked banking account number associated with a particular account.

nickname.description: An alternate name for the account.

days_available.description: Number of days for which transactions are available out of days_requested.

direct_deposit_from_employer.description: Account is used for direct deposits from employer.

updated_at.description: The date and time of the most recent update made to the account in Truv, in ISO 8601 format.

institution_name.description: The name of the financial institution associated with the account.

mask.description: The last four digits of the account number.

nickname.description: A user-defined name or label for the account.

is_open.description: Indicates whether the account is currently open.

interest_rate.description: The account's interest rate, if applicable.

interest_rate_type.description: Specifies the type of interest rate for the account.

maturity_date.description: The date when the account reaches maturity.

loan_term.description: The duration of the loan associated with the account, in months.

apr.description: The Annual Percentage Rate (APR) associated with the account.

account_number.description: Account number. A unique identifier assigned to a financial account for tracking and managing transactions, providing essential information for financial operations. Returned only when full_account_number parameter is set.

routing_number.description: Routing number. A unique identifier for a financial institution. It is used to route and process transactions, ensuring accurate and secure transfers of funds. Returned only when full_account_number parameter is set.

owners.description: List of owners for account. Returned only when full_account_number parameter is set.

days_requested.description: The specific duration in days for which the report is requested to be generated.

consumer_report_permissible_purpose.description: Describes the reason you are generating an Income Insights Report for this user.

mask.description: The masked banking account number associated with a particular account.

nickname.description: An alternate name for the account.

type.description: The parent type of the account, e.g., CHECKING or SAVINGS.

subtype.description: The accounts subtype, e.g., PLAN_401_K, MONEY_MARKET, or HOME_EQUITY.

start_date.description: Minimum of all dates within the specific income sources in the user's bank account for days requested by the client.

end_date.description: Maximum of all dates within the specific income sources in the users bank account for days requested by the client.

income_description.description: Description for the underlying income transactions.

pay_frequency.description:
Pay frequency:

* `M` - Monthly,
* `SM` - Semi-Monthly,
* `W` - Weekly,
* `BW` - Bi-Weekly,
* `A` - Annually,
* `SA` - Semiannually,
* `C` - Commission

total_amount.description: Total amount of earnings for the income source of the user in the summary.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

transaction_count.description: Number of income transactions per end user for this source.

historical_summary.description: List of bank statements for each period.

start_date.description: The start date of the period covered in this monthly summary. This date will be the first day of the month, unless the month being covered is a partial month because it is the first month included in the summary and the date range being requested does not begin with the first day of the month.

end_date.description: The end date of the period included in this monthly summary. This date will be the last day of the month, unless the month being covered is a partial month because it is the last month included in the summary and the date range being requested does not end with the last day of the month.

total_amount.description: Total amount of earnings for the income source of the user for the month in the summary.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

amount.description: The settled value of the transaction, denominated in the transactions's currency as stated in iso_currency_code. Negative values when money moves out of the account; positive othervise.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

date.description: The date that the transaction occurred.

check_number.description: The check number for the transaction.

pending.description: True if status of the transaction is PENDING or not set.

historical_average_monthly_income.description: Historical average income deposited into the account, per calendar month, typically net of taxes and deductions.

historical_average_monthly_gross_income.description: Historical average gross payment amount, per calendar month, predicted based on the transaction data.

forecasted_average_monthly_income.description: Forecasted income deposited into the account, per calendar month.

updated_at.description: The date and time of the most recent update made to the link, in ISO 8601 format.

tracking_info.description: Additional optional identifier passed by user.

iso_currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the amount or balance.

start_date.description: Minimum of all transaction dates among all income sources in the user's bank accounts for days requested by the client.

end_date.description: Maximum of all transaction dates among all income sources in the user's bank accounts for days requested by the client.

income_sources_count.description: Number of income sources per end user.

income_categories_count.description: Number of income categories per end user.

income_transactions_count.description: Number of income transactions per end user.

total_amounts.description: Total amount of income earned, over all sources. One per currency.

historical_average_monthly_gross_income.description: Total monthly average gross income earned historically, over all sources. One per currency. Gross amounts are estimated from transactions.

historical_average_monthly_income.description: Total monthly average income earned historically, over all sources. One per currency.

forecasted_average_monthly_income.description: Total forecasted monthly average income, over all sources. One per currency.

historical_annual_gross_income.description: Annualized gross income earned historically, over all sources. One per currency.

historical_annual_income.description: Annualized income earned historically, over all sources. One per currency.

forecasted_annual_income.description: Annualized forecasted income, over all sources. One per currency.

bank_name.description: Bank name. Required for the `create` action.

deposit_type.description:
Deposit type.
For `pll` product type is required and must be set to `amount`.
For `deposit_switch` product type is optional and can be set to any supported value.

* `entire` - Entire paycheck,
* `percent` - Percentage of the paycheck,
* `amount` - Fixed amount from the paycheck

deposit_value.description:
Deposit value.

Possible values for this field depend on the `deposit_type` field:
`percent` - this field must be set to a whole number between 0 and 100.
`amount` - this field must be set to a number between 0 and 9999.99.
`entire` - this field must be set to `null` or be not provided.

template_id.description: An ID of a customization template.

request_extended_history.description: A boolean parameter to enable extended transaction/statement history.

locale.description: Locale parameter for regional customization of the Bridge.

data_sources.description: List of data sources for the provided product_type. Leave blank to apply default values.

name.description: Public name for this webhook config.

webhook_url.description: Webhook URL where event data will be sent.

events.description: List of events sent to this webhook URL.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the webhook was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the webhook was updated last time.
